title: Nefarious Creatures
description: When an evil wish is made, a nefarious creature is born.Created from ash and fire, Cassiopeia is a living evil wish, motivated to fulfill her purpose. Along with her fellow new-borns Bea and Odin, they leave the Roost and attend Ballard High in a gated community just beyond their blackened wood.Entrancing the smartest guy in school before killing him in cold blood is a bit odd, but Cassiopeia doesn't ask questions. After the lines blur and her feelings turn real, she has to make a decision. With Headmother's deadly persistence looming over her, it will be a fight to keep them both alive.
author: Camille Caliman
